summary: "Demon Slayer: Kimetsu no Yaiba" is a popular Japanese comic (manga) series by Koyoharu Gotouge. It tells the story of Tanjiro Kamado, a teenager who becomes a Demon Slayer after his family is killed and his sister, Nezuko, turns into a demon. The manga was adapted into an anime TV series with 26 episodes in 2019, followed by movies and more seasons. It has sold over 150 million copies and is one of the best-selling manga series ever. The story, art, and action scenes have been highly praised.
title: Demon Slayer Kimetsu no Yaiba
